definition.value: Encryption Data sohwɛfo
Ntrɛwmu ahorow
Encryption Data Nnwinnade a Wɔde Di Dwuma
Gyinabea:
Nhyehyɛe a Wɔhyehyɛ:
Generate Key Pair no
Encrypt Data a Wɔde Sie
Kɔkɔbɔ: Wunni kwan sɛ wobɛsesa nneɛma a wɔde mena a egyina mu duru so!
Mfomso: Safoa din abien a wɔapaw no wɔ hɔ dedaw!

Saa ntrɛwmu yi hwehwɛ sɛ wɔyɛ nhyehyɛe ne adwene a ɛkɔ akyiri
Sɛ wɔma ɛyɛ adwuma na wɔde data no sie wie a, undo BIARA nni hɔ na wontumi nsiw ntrɛwmu no ano!

​​

Kɔkɔbɔ: OpenSSL ma PHP nni hɔ anaasɛ ɛnnyɛ adwuma. Worentumi mfa encryption anaa saa ntrɛwmu yi nni dwuma!
Hwɛ HELP ma ntrɛwmu yi na woanya nsɛm pii.

Kɔkɔbɔ: Wɔnnyɛ Data Encryption adwuma wɔ wo AbanteCart so. Worentumi mfa saa ntrɛwmu yi nkyerɛw/decrypt data!
Hwɛ HELP ma ntrɛwmu yi na woanya nsɛm pii.
Generate Key Pair no
Encrypt Data a Wɔde Sie
Data field(s) a wɔhwehwɛ a ɛyera. Yɛsrɛ sɛ hwɛ gyinapɛn ahorow a wɔde ama no

Unique key pair name:
Ɛnsɛ sɛ edin no kura spaces anaa nkyerɛwde soronko biara. Ɛma ɛyɛ tiawa na ɛnyɛ den.

Safoa tenten (bits):
Kyerɛ safoa encryption bit tenten. Dodow kɛse gyina hɔ ma encryption a emu yɛ den, nanso ebetumi ama adwumayɛ ayɛ brɛoo (Range 256 - 8192 ) .

Ecncryption type:
Eyi yɛ encryption nhyehyɛe. Fa default RSA di dwuma sɛ wonyɛ advanced user a.

Enable password based key:
Sɛ enable a, ɛho behia sɛ wode passphrase foforo ka ho na wode private key adi dwuma de akyerɛkyerɛ nsɛm mu. HYƐ NSO. Mprempren wɔmfa eyi ntom wɔ data encryption mu.

Passphrase anaa key password:
Kae sɛ mfaso biara nni passphrase anaa key(s) no so na ebia data bɛyera

Wɔabɔ key pair. Hwɛ safe a ɛwɔ aseɛ ha na fa sie dwoodwoo.

%s

%s. Nkyem
Key pair awo ntoatoaso no dii nkogu. Hwɛ wo nhyehyɛe no na hwɛ mfomso ho kyerɛwtohɔ.

Key pair name:
Paw safoa a wode bedi dwuma de ayɛ encryption. NEA ƐHO HIA: Kae safoa a wode dii dwuma no

Table(s) to encrypt:
Wɔde safoa a wɔapaw no bɛhyɛ table(s) a wɔakyerɛ no mu. Saa safoa yi nkutoo na wobetumi abue data

Test Mode:
Di kan hwɛ sɛ ne nyinaa yɛ OK sɛ wɔde encrepted.

Yi source data:
Yi source un-encrepted data records bere a encryption no awie no

Wɔayɛ data no encrypted.
Hwɛ nsɛm no mu nsɛm:

%s

Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wɔde saa safoa yi di dwuma ma data encryption foforo a, fa line a edidi so yi ka fael system/config.php ho : define('DATA_ENCRYPTION_KEYPAIR', '%s');

Data encryption test result Hwɛ mfomso log sɛ mfomso biara a ebetumi aba!

%s
Data encryption no antumi anyɛ yiye. Hwɛ wo nhyehyɛe no na hwɛ mfomso ho kyerɛwtohɔ.

Nsɛm a ɛho hia a wɔakyerɛw ato hɔ! Sɛ wɔwie encryption wie a, wɔbɛkyerɛw data akɔ mirror tables a data encrypted wɔ mu no so.
Di akwankyerɛ akyi na fa nhyehyeɛ bɛka system/config.php ho ama AbanteCart adan akenkan/kyerɛw dwumadie akɔ encrypted tables so.
Fa nkyerɛwde a edidi so yi ka nhyehyɛe fael no ho: define('DATA_ENCRYPTION_KEYPAIR', 'wo_safoa_din');
Eyi bɛyɛ default key ama akenkan/kyerɛw dwumadi ahorow
Encryption a Wɔde Di Dwuma
Data kyerɛwtohɔ ahorow a wɔmfa encrypted
Fa 'Encrypt Data' Tab di dwuma ma encryption a edi kan
Data kyerɛwtohɔ ahorow a wɔabɔ no kokoam
Key ID no
Edin Titiriw
Encrypted Tables a Wɔde Di Dwuma
Dannan (sesa) Encryption kɔ safoa foforo so
kyerɛwtohɔ (nsɛm) .
